biotools.summary: Provides the ability to find structural matches to a user-specified catalytic site among all Protein Data Bank (PDB) proteins. The web server can also examine a user-specified protein to identify structural matches to a library of catalytic sites.

bioschemas.name: Catalytic Site Identification
bioschemas.summary: Provides the ability to find structural matches to a user-specified catalytic site among all Protein Data Bank (PDB) proteins. The web server can also examine a user-specified protein to identify structural matches to a library of catalytic sites.
